title: UCLA Nike Zoom Pegasus 41 Shoe
content: Responsive cushioning in the Pegasus provides an energized ride for everyday road running. Experience lighter-weight energy return with dual Air Zoom units and a ReactX foam midsole.

title: UCLA Chenille B Patch Hooded Sweatshirt
UCLA Julia Gash Mug
content: This whimsical mug featuring a design by Julia Gash features the spirit and terrain of UCLA.

title: UCLA Block Over Bruins Swoosh Flex Cap
content: Six-panel Dri-FIT fabric construction with Dri-FIT sweatband. 3D embroidery on center front, team mark at center back, and Swoosh design trademark on wearer's left side.

title: UCLA Charlie Bear
content: Cute, and cuddly, our plush mascot is a BRUIN lover, not a fighter.

title: UCLA Script Utensil Set
content: Comes with fork. spoon, knife and travel case

title: UCLA Walking Bear License Plate Frame
